trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Anchorage
There were no other sightings in Anchorage on or around September 1st 1999
divs: sighting detailsit was at night and my husband wanted to get more beer and he was already drunk and he could not drive so i said i would take him up as i don't drink and i could drive. i was mad at him and we was going up our drive way and i stopped as i saw the fire truck of the guy that lives across the street and i saw his red and blue light and was thinking fire or a car accident then just above his truck i saw these real big bright lights (it was almost like seeing football stadium like lights) and my mind could not wrap around it as it was to low and going the wrong direction and was way to slow. and i kept thinking what is wrong with this. and i kept thinking this is not right. and i kept thinking what is that and i tried to get my husband to look and he was so drunk he did not see it. it looked like it was just sort of floating slow and it was right over the houses like right there i looked at my dash board on my truck and the radio still worked so nothing happen to them and as it got to my side of the truck i rolled down my window and i was thinking what flies in the shape of a triangle and i kept looking and i could see it front to back and side to side and under it to the top and i was thinking no frame no engine noise no wings and no propeller and then i knew what it was it was a ufo and it was right there at about 11 at night and it just kept going real slow and as it got passed i was still looking at it and i still could see the the front and sides and as i looked at the back it was dark but i could see nothing and i also noticed it was following the power line and my husband said lets go or the store will be closed. we have two bases not to far from our house, one is call ft.richardson and it is at anchorage. that one is the air force base and the other base is the army base. that one is called ft. elemendorf just out of anchorage. i think this ufo was so low that no one could see it on radar. i have lived by two different air ports and and i have been to air show and i have seen and heard jets as they fly to the side of our house and also army helicopters that fly over our house and i have seen the stealth bomber and also the concord and the jets at the airport and we have float planes that fly around. i've also seen a parachute glider and a parachute glider with an engine that you sit in. and also twin turbo prop plane so i really know what i saw. i did not tell anyone because i did not know who to tell and as i guess i was the only one to see it. i told my mom and and she believes me and i told my friend and she believes me. i also told the guy i was working for, who was an airplane pilot at the time, but he didn't believe me because he doesn't believe in ufos. the only other person i've told of this was my son and he doesn't believe me. i don't care who believes me or doesn't, i know what i saw and i hope this helps you guys out at least a little. it was right there and i saw it, no mistakes. i didn't want to think anyone to think i was crazy so i kept it to myself until i saw mufon on the history channel on 01\13\2010. i tend to watch all the ufo oritented shows anyways before and after my experience. this is all true as far as i remember.
Summary: Triangle shaped, three lights in the back, two lights in the center, one in the front, looked like bright stadium like lights
